full_summary:
### Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS) In-Service Support [SRV] 

### Official Title |   Titre Officiel
*English*: Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS) In-Service Support
*French*: Système d’information sur la santé des Forces canadiennes (SISFC) Soutien en service

### Brief Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested industry parties to participate in the Request for Information (RFI) for Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS) In-Service Support. 

### End User Information 
The CFHIS In-Service Support project serves the Department of National Defence (DND) and is managed by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). DND is the primary beneficiary of the project. 

### Background Information 
PWGSC invites the industry to provide their comments, concerns, and recommendations for the CFHIS competitive procurement for DND. The RFI is an opportunity to identify best practices about how the requirements or objectives described in the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) document could be satisfied.

### Important Dates
*##### Publication Date*: 2023-07-31
*##### Tender Closing Date*: 2023-09-11T14:00:00 

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or need more information, please contact Heather Ferrier, PWGSC procurement representative at heather.ferrier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Relevant Information
This tender announcement is for a Request for Information (RFI) only. Bidders are invited to submit their responses through [SAP Ariba]. PWGSC will review the RFI responses that will be received on or before 2023-09-11T14:00:00. Suppliers will not be compensated for their responses to this RFI.

# Industry Requirements
Industry must provide their comments, concerns and best practices regarding how the requirements or objectives described in this request for information could be satisfied. Suppliers must respond electronically through [SAP Ariba]. A bid package for the Request for Proposal (RFP) will be released after reviewing the responses from this RFI. 

300 characters left, ignore! 
References:
 None.  # Industry Agreements Trade Agreements 
The bid that will be selected for this project can be subject to the following Trade Agreements should the selected bidder be a foreign company:

*  Canada-Panama Free Trade
